name: Chatting Application
desc: Real-time Java desktop chat app with responsive Swing/AWT GUI, socket programming, and OOP concepts.

name: Periodic Table Website
desc: An interactive periodic table with click-to-view details, memory tricks, and built-in learning games. Created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Excel to Graph Converter
desc: A tool that reads .csv/.xlsx files and generates dynamic histograms using JavaScript charting libraries. Helps in visualizing large datasets with ease.

name: Universal Buck Converter JIG
desc: A hardware-software integrated jig for testing DC-DC buck converters. Features include voltage/current monitoring and short-circuit protection.

name: Electronics Calculator Suite
desc: Web-based calculator suite for electronics engineers covering converters, resistors, ADC, and capacitance.

name: MPPT Solar Street Light
desc: Developed control logic for a solar street light using MPPT for real-time energy optimization and battery monitoring.

name: Smart Door Lock
desc: OTP-based smart door lock system integrated with a Telegram bot for real-time access control and remote authentication.

name: Personal Productivity Tracker
desc: Built an Arduino-based sensor system with a desktop app for real-time activity monitoring and analytics.
